title: Holly Madison and Bridget Marquardt may connect with their late ex Hugh Hefner
text:
The Girls Next Door may be connecting with the late Hugh Hefner this Halloween season.

Holly Madison and Bridget Marquardt will be holding a séance with medium-to-the stars Patti Negri, according to TMZ.

Bridget, 46, and Holly, 39, both famously dated Hugh while living together at the Playboy Mansion, and the former is reportedly hopeful their ex will come through during the reading.

Connecting with the spirit world: Holly Madison and Bridget Marquardt will be having a séance on the night before Halloween

Holly, however, has no particular ghost she wishes to connect with and is fine communicating with just about any spirit.

The séance will be hosted by Holly at her house on the night before Halloween.

Holly believes her home is haunted, which may be a useful attribute as the ladies attempt to connect with the spirit world.

The whole séance will be made available to fans on a variety of platforms.

Life with Hef: Holly, Bridget, and Kendra Wilkinson all dated Hef while living together at the Playboy Mansion (pictured 2007 in Monte Carlo)

His number one: Holly was considered Hef's main girlfriend, and she was open about her desire to marry him and have his children

Not only will the reading be featured on Bridget's podcast, Ghost Magnet, but the séance will be streamed live on YouTube, Instagram, and Facebook.

Alongside Kendra Wilkinson, Holly and Bridget starred on the hit E! reality series, The Girls Next Door, which chronicled their lives inside the Playboy Mansion as Hef's live-in girlfriends.

Holly was considered Hef's main girlfriend, and she was open about her desire to marry him and have his children.

From beyond the grave: Not only will the reading be featured on Bridget's podcast, Ghost Magnet, but the séance will be streamed live on YouTube, Instagram, and Facebook

But in 2008 the couple split after seven years together, and in her 2015 memoir Down The Rabbit Hole, Holly blasted her ex and alleged he was abusive to her and his other girlfriends.

Hef tied the knot with Crystal Harris in 2012, and they remained married until he passed away in 2017.

The Playboy founder died at age 91 at his mansion in Holmby Hills.
description: As fans may remember, both of the women dated Hugh Hefner while living together at the Playboy Mansion, and Bridget is hopeful their famous ex will come through during the reading.
